variations.variation_name: Shredded cooked pork or chicken (or beans/vegetables for vegetarian version)
Boneless chicken thighs (cut into large chunks)
Boneless chicken thighs (skinless, cut into chunks)
Chicken (bone-in pieces, such as thighs or drumsticks)
Shredded cooked chicken (or beans for vegetarian version)
Chicken thigh (boneless, skin-on, cut into bite-size pieces)
Shrimp (peeled and deveined) or assorted vegetables (e.g., sweet potato, zucchini, eggplant)
Cooked shrimp, peeled and halved lengthwise
Chicken broth (or vegetable broth for vegetarian option)
Cornstarch slurry (equal parts cornstarch and water)
Thai bird's eye chilies (adjust to taste)
Rice vermicelli noodles, cooked and cooled
Whole black lentils (sabut urad dal, soaked overnight)
Wooden or bamboo skewers (soaked in water)
Dried corn husks (soaked in warm water)
Dosa batter (fermented rice and urad dal blend)
Whole duck (cleaned, about 2 kg per duck)
Fresh raw fish (sushi-grade, e.g., salmon or tuna, sliced)
Salsa roja or salsa verde (for filling)
Sweet and sour sauce (prepared or homemade)
Whole spices (bay leaf, cloves, cardamom, cinnamon stick)
